introduction.section1: Taiwan is a modern island and is mainly known for its capital Taipei, but you will discover exceptional panoramas. Go on treks in Taroko National Park, discover the mountainous city of Jiufen and its extraordinary peak view, or walk near the beaches to discover atypical rock formations.
introduction.section2: Follow our guide to discover our selection of must-see places, through our articles and our photos, of this country.

google-description: Discover Taiwan through our articles and our photos. Follow our guide to find out about our selection of must-see places. For each place visited we try to transcribe our visit as best as possible by telling you: Where to go? How to get there? Why? When? How long and at what period?
social-network-description: Discover the island of Taiwan beyond its modern capital. Go on treks in Taroko National Park, discover the mountainous city of Jiufen and its extraordinary peak view, or walk near the beaches to discover atypical rock formations. Follow our guide to discover our selection of must-see places.
